abstract: Texas Rangers acquire catcher Jonathan Lucroy and pitcher Jeremy Jeffress from Milwaukee Brewers; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: A day after Lucroy rejected a trade to the Cleveland Indians, he was sent to Texas, along with closer Jeremy Jeffress, for two former first-round draft picks.
snippet: A day after Lucroy rejected a trade to the Cleveland Indians, he was sent to Texas, along with closer Jeremy Jeffress, for two former first-round draft picks....

headline.main: Brewers Send All-Star Catcher Jonathan Lucroy to the Rangers
headline.print_headline: Lucroy Is Dealt to the Rangers
